line1: I think a lot about my hometown now.
line2: I'm turning 90 tomorrow, and I think a lot about my hometown.
line3: The times I went swimming. The stories of playing with the kids on Namsan mountain (in Haeju).
line4: The times we caught "geoi." We call crabs "geoi." The times we caught geoi.
line5: I reminisce about things like that. When the geoi came out, we would catch them with our hands.
line7: We used to go goby fishing with a fishing rod, after sprinkling some oil.
